idea:
FUINSO is an INNOTECH Company working on Product Inventions and Innovations for corporate clients.We provide them our patented products for commercialization. We also undertake project based inventions & innovations for our clients.
We are known for our out of the box thinking and to provide commercially viable inventions to our clients spread across various segments like FMCG, Pharmaceuticals, Health, Digital Diagnostics, Alternative Energy, Artificial Intelligence, Automobile, Packaging etc.
We in FUINSO work in a unique way and work closely with our client's so as to give the best possible solution for their requirements in a time bound manner.
We maintain complete confidentiality of clients and project which we undertake.
name: FUINSO Innotech Pvt Ltd

idea:
LearnFreakOut Digital Solutions Pvt. Ltd. – the company with experience in Technology Solutions in Indian Market.


Our company provide specialized focus on providing technology services in:

• Business Technology Solutions : Web & Mobile App Development | Bot Development | Big Data & Analytics | AI based Solutions | IoT Solutions
name: LEARNFREAKOUT DIGITAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Roundabouts is a medium to fulfill the needs of corporate entities to plan their activities hassle free. Our core strength lies in creating efficient technology to our corporate clients for their MICE Requirements.
     Our persistent dynamisms is dedicated to create easy and smooth platform for the corporates while choosing their requirements for Meetings, Seminars, Conferences, Incentive trips or events. Our constant efforts are laid in to achieve total customer satisfaction.
name: ROUNDABOUTS MEETSOL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are providing fabrication services in Mild Steel (MS) and Stainless steel (SS) materials. We manufacture products as per customer requirements. We also provide design support to our customers. 

Product details: 

Sheet metal fabrication.

Fabrication in pipes, Bars/Rods, Angles, channels or any other cross section of materials as per customer requirement.

idea: JP ENVO is an EPC and O&M contractor for utility-scale solar power projects. Building on its extensive experience of small medium scale solar projects, the company positioned to meet the challenges of the rapidly growing global solar market. With a strong in-house engineering capability,JP ENVO designs and delivers high quality solar projects.

idea: We’re experiencing an era of unprecedented change in health care. New technology, new services and new ideas will be needed to deliver improved outcomes for businesses and patients.
